<pre><code>struct QuizQuestion questions\[NUM_QUESTIONS];
int giveQuiz() {
    int <span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">score</span> = 0;
    char <span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">buffer</span>\[100];
    for (int i = 0; i &lt; NUM_QUESTIONS; ++i) {
        gets(buffer);
        if (checkAnswer(buffer, &amp;questions\[i])) {
            score += 1;
        }
    }
    return score;
}
</code></pre>
